description: Try our easy to follow Quesadilla recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quesadilla Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids lunch & dinner,Fresh Food Kids,Kids lunchbox

recipeInstructions.text: Mix vegetarian mince with cumin and paprika. Lay wrap on cutting board and fill half with mince, cheese and spinach. Fold wrap in half, forming a half-moon shape, and press gently to flatten.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium-low heat. Add the quesadilla and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden and cheese is melted. Slice in half to serve.
